text: Binɨb mapen yad okok, tɨtay kɨdek gɨnɨgab ak nepɨm, anɨb ak nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb. Mel ak, binɨb tɨtɨmel gɨl yepɨs agɨl monmon gɨpal okok, kɨli gɨpal adek anɨb ak kɨdek gɨl apyap pakɨnɨmɨb tek lup. Nɨbi pen, Klays nop gos kɨles gɨl lɨnɨŋɨd, jak kɨles gɨl mɨdebɨm. Anɨb ak anɨgɨl yonɨgun agɨl, nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb.
